title: Statement by the Press Secretary regarding S. 735 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 15, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary regarding S. 735




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  _________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                May 15, 2009  STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY   Today, on Friday, May 15, 2009, the President signed into law:   S. 735, the "Protecting Incentives for the Adoption of Children with Special Needs Act of 2009," which ensures that States receive incentive payments for adoptions made in fiscal years 2008 through 2012 in accordance with the Fostering Connections to Success and Increasing Adoptions Act of 2008.
